attributes.action: to introduce shareable tax allowances for spouses with school age children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would prevent the unfair situation where a couple who both work pay less tax (because of 2 tax allowances and 2 basic rate allowances) than a couple (whose income is the same) where one partner works and the other partner is in unpaid childcare.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
